Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Locate the cat within the household environment.', '2. Touch the cat once found.']

def in_house(cat:item):
    # Function to check if the cat is inside the house
    symbol in_house=exists room: item : inside(cat, room)
    return in_house

def is_cat_found():
    # Function to check if the cat has been found
    symbol found=exists cat: item : is_cat(cat) and visited(cat)
    return found

behavior find_cat(cat:item):
    body:
        achieve visited(cat)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists cat: item : is_cat(cat) and is_cat_found():
            bind cat: item where:
                is_cat(cat) and visited(cat)
            achieve close_char(char, cat)

        else:
            foreach cat: item:
                if is_cat(cat) and not visited(cat):
                    observe(cat, "Check if this is the cat I am looking for")

Goal Representation:
behavior touch_cat(cat:item):
    body:
        achieve facing_char(char, cat)
        # Ensure the character is facing the cat to touch it
        touch(cat)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat) and close_char(char, cat)
        # Select the cat that is close to the character
        touch_cat(cat)
